<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Stop TAS Droplets Ongoing Scan</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v33.00/tas-droplets/stop"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"monitorImages"}
```



Stops the ongoing scan of TAS Droplets.

### cURL Request

Refer to the following cURL command:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  "https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/tas-droplets/stop"
```

OK
